column1: All was now quiet in the meeting-house save the calm
column2: steady voice of the preacher. Pretty soon a wee creature dressed all in soft brown stole across the floor of a certain pew. She was a courageous little body indeed
column3: but what mother would not venture a good deal for her hungry babies? Such a repast as this was certainly the opportunity of a lifetime. Looking cautiously around
column4: then concluding that all was safe
column5: she disappeared down a hole in a corner way under the seat. In a twinkling she was back again; this time
column7: she was not alone. Four little ones pattered after Mamma Mouse
column8: and eight bright eyes spied a dinner worth running for.Never mind what they did; but when Johnnie awoke at the strains of the closing hymn and tried to remember what had gone wrong
column9: he saw nothing of the pink-frosted cakes save some scattered crumbs.
